mathFontFamilyList_description.message: List of font families to display in the context menu.

mathFontFamily_description.message: Font to use for the mathematical formulas. Leave empty to use the default value.

mathFontScale_description.message: Scale factor (in percent) to apply to the mathematical formulas.

mathFontImportant_title.description: 'important' is a CSS term, do not translate it.

mathFontImportant_description.message: If this option is enabled, the CSS rules added by the add-on will be marked 'important' to try to override the page style.
mathFontImportant_description.description: 'important' is a CSS term, do not translate it.
